Header.title: Welcome to Lavie Nail Bar
Header.paragraph: You're one step closer to arriving at one of the most luxurious places in Frisco, TX, where we strive to meet the services you need. Appointment are recommended and we look forward to seeing you!

About.paragraph: Conveniently located off State Hwy 121, we always make our best efforts to bring the best comfort and convenience to our clients. With luxurious decorations and harmoni designs in a cozy atmosphere, our clients can immerse themselves in our relaxing treatments to escape from everyday stress and busy lifestyle. Our staff are here to ensure that our clients always have a positive and high quality experience.
Why: Up to date with latest nail trends
Variety of complimentary wine, margaritas and soft drinks
Disposable nail files, pumice stones and spa liners
Why2: Host your next bridal, bachelorette, birthday or any special event
